<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2911</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Back to School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zurück zu Schule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De nouveau à l'école</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para trás à escola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Di nuovo alla scuola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίσω στο σχολείο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">De nuevo a escuela</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit with "Back to school" Activities and thoughts on the new school year</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">school</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">activities</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit mit "zurück 
zu Schule" Aktivitäten und Gedanken auf dem neuen Schuljahr</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive avec des 
activités et des pensées "de nouveau à école" la nouvelle année 
scolaire</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa com "traseira 
atividades e pensamentos à escola" no ano de escola novo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva con "di nuovo le 
attività ed i pensieri alla scuola" sul nuovo anno scolastico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα με "πίσω 
τις σχολικέσ" δραστηριότητες και τις σκέψεις στο νέο σχολικό 
έτος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva con "de nuevo 
actividades y pensamientos de la escuela" en el nuevo año escolar</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlinemaßeinheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivitäten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité en ligne</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">école</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividades</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità in linea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scuola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα</string>
